attributes.action: launch an independant enquiry into government funding of Brake.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been revealed that the so called independant road safety group Brake recieved over £70 000 in grants and payments from the government in 2007.

This makes up a proportion of 6.5% of their total income for the year 2007. There are also questions over a further £285000 recieved from "corporate partnerships" which are are unknown.

Brake is meant to be an Independant Charity however it is recieving government funding and is supporting government campaigns.
